summary.span: 命名空间包含一些类，可使用这些类在网页上创建 Web 服务器控件。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that allow you to create Web server controls on a Web page.

summary.span: Web 服务器控件运行在服务器上，并且包括按钮和文本框等窗体控件。

span.span: Web server controls run on the server and include form controls such as buttons and text boxes.

summary.span: 它们还包括具有特殊用途的控件（例如日历）。

span.span: They also include special-purpose controls such as a calendar.

summary.span: 由于 Web 服务器控件运行在服务器上，因此可以以编程方式来控制这些元素。

span.span: Because Web server controls run on the server, you can programmatically control these elements.

summary.span: 尽管 Web 服务器控件呈现为 HTML，但它们的对象模型不一定反映 HTML 语法。

span.span: Although Web server controls are rendered as HTML, their object model does not necessarily reflect HTML syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间包含呈现为 HTML 标记的类，如 控件和 控件。The namespace contains classes that are rendered as HTML tags, such as the control and the control. 命名空间还包含不在网页上呈现的类，但支持数据操作，例如 和 类。The namespace also contains classes that are not rendered on the Web page, but support data operations, such as the and classes. 其他控件（如 和 控件）支持数据显示和编辑。Other controls, such as the and controls, support data display and editing. 类用作命名空间中的许多类的基类 。The class serves as the base class for many of the classes in the namespace.

related.span: 使用 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件

span.span: Working with ASP.NET Web Server Controls

related.span: ASP.NET 移动页的标准控件
